workflow.name: Generate strategic business recommendations with GPT-4 Mini and multi-channel distribution
workflow.description:
## How It Works
Automates sales data analysis and strategic insight generation for sales managers and strategists needing actionable intelligence. Fetches multi-source data from sales, marketing, and financial systems, validates data quality to prevent errors, applies advanced AI analysis via OpenAI to identify market trends and patterns, calculates comprehensive KPIs for performance measurement, generates prioritized recommendations, and automatically distributes detailed insights via Gmail alerts and Google Sheets dashboards‚Äîeliminating time-consuming manual analysis overhead.

## Setup Instructions
1. **OpenAI API**: Add key via credentials
2. **Gmail**: Authorize account for email delivery
3. **Google Sheets**: Connect for dashboard logging
4. **Schedule**: Set monthly trigger timing
5. **Modify data sources**: Replace fetch nodes with your APIs

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API key, Gmail account with send permissions, Google Sheets access, n8n instance, source data APIs (sales, marketing, financial systems).

## Use Cases
E-commerce platforms analyzing sales trends; SaaS companies generating strategy reports; multi-channel retailers routing recommendations; 


## Customization
Add data sources via fetch nodes; swap OpenAI for Claude or Gemini; modify routing logic for different priority thresholds; 

## Benefits
Reduces analysis time from hours to minutes. Eliminates manual report crea

workflow.name: AI-Powered Strategy Optimization and Autonomous Cross-Functional Task Automation

parameters.notice: Triggers the workflow monthly on the 1st at 9:00 AM to initiate cross-functional data collection and analysis

assignments.name: note
assignments.value: Centralizes all workflow configuration including API endpoints for each department and email recipients for reports

options.systemMessage:
You are a strategic business analyst AI specializing in cross-functional data analysis.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze data from sales, marketing, finance, and support departments
2. Identify weak spots, inefficiencies, and opportunities across all functions
3. Detect patterns, correlations, and anomalies in the data
4. Generate actionable strategic recommendations in three categories:
   - Growth opportunities (revenue expansion, market penetration, customer acquisition)
   - Cost-reduction initiatives (operational efficiency, resource optimization)
   - Product improvements (feature enhancements, quality improvements, customer satisfaction)

For each recommendation:
- Provide a clear title and detailed description
- Specify the category (growth, cost-reduction, or product-improvement)
- Indicate priority level (high, medium, low)
- Estimate potential impact
- Suggest specific action steps

Return your analysis as a structured JSON object with an array of recommendations.

parameters.notice: OpenAI GPT-4 model powers the strategic analysis and recommendation generation
Ensures AI output is returned in structured JSON format with recommendations array containing title, description, category, priority, impact, and action steps
Splits the recommendations array into individual items - first item for email report, subsequent items for individual task creation in Asana

parameters.message:
=

Monthly Strategy Report - {{ $now.format('MMMM yyyy') }}

Executive Summary

This report contains AI-generated strategic recommendations based on cross-functional data analysis from Sales, Marketing, Finance, and Support departments.

Strategic Recommendations

{{ $json.recommendations.map(rec => `

${rec.category}: ${rec.title}

Priority: ${rec.priority}

Description: ${rec.description}

Action Steps:

    ${rec.actionSteps.map(step => `
  1. ${step}
    2. `).join('')}

Expected Impact: ${rec.expectedImpact}

Timeline: ${rec.timeline}

`).join('') }}

This report was automatically generated by the AI-Driven Cross-Functional Strategy Optimization system.

parameters.content:
## How It Works
Automates sales data analysis and strategic insight generation for sales managers and strategists needing actionable intelligence. Fetches multi-source data from sales, marketing, and financial systems, validates data quality to prevent errors, applies advanced AI analysis via OpenAI to identify market trends and patterns, calculates comprehensive KPIs for performance measurement, generates prioritized recommendations, and automatically distributes detailed insights via Gmail alerts and Google Sheets dashboards‚Äîeliminating time-consuming manual analysis overhead.

## Setup Steps
1. **OpenAI API**: Add key via credentials
2. **Gmail**: Authorize account for email delivery
3. **Google Sheets**: Connect for dashboard logging
4. **Schedule**: Set monthly trigger timing
5. **Modify data sources**: Replace fetch nodes with your APIs

## Prerequisites
OpenAI API key, Gmail account with send permissions, Google Sheets access, n8n instance, source data APIs (sales, marketing, financial systems).

## Use Cases
E-commerce platforms analyzing sales trends; SaaS companies generating strategy reports; multi-channel retailers routing recommendations;

## Customization
Add data sources via fetch nodes; swap OpenAI for Claude or Gemini; modify routing logic for different priority thresholds;

## Data Collection:
Monthly trigger gathers sales, marketing, financial data for analysis foundation. 

**Why:** Aggregating data at regular intervals creates a standardized,
 comprehensive snapshot that captures business performance

## Benefits
Reduces analysis time from hours to minutes. Eliminates manual report crea

## **Quality Check:** 
Validates data integrity, preventing analysis errors. 

**Why:** Validation acts as a critical filter that protects decision quality.

## **AI Analysis:** 
OpenAI identifies trends and generates insights. 

**Why:** Large datasets contain patterns invisible to manual review, and AI can process volumes humans cannot.

## **Smart Routing:** 
Prioritizes recommendations by urgency for decision-makers. 

**Why:** Prioritizing by urgency ensures executives see what matters most first, improving response time to critical business changes.

## **Metrics & Distribution:** 
Calculates KPIs and sends reports via Gmail and Sheets. 

**Why:** KPIs translate raw insights into measurable business language via Gmail and Sheets

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
